Update settings for this server.

## Usage

```sh
/set default-volume
```

## Subcommands

### default-volume

Update the default volume for this server.

#### Options

|     Name     |                     Description                    | Required |
| :----------: | :------------------------------------------------: | :------: |
| `percentage` | The new default volume percentage for this server. |    Yes   |

## Required Permissions

:::note
Learn more about permissions in [Discord's FAQ](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206029707-Setting-Up-Permissions-FAQ).
:::
